scripts.dev: concurrently --names "server,webapp" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w webapp"
scripts.start: concurrently --names "server,webapp" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run start -w server" "npm run start -w webapp"
scripts.build: npm run build -w lib && npm run build -w server && npm run build -w webapp
scripts.test: npm run test -w lib && npm run test -w server && npm run test -w webapp
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage -w lib && npm run test:coverage -w server && npm run test:coverage -w webapp
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "npm run test:watch -w lib" "npm run test:watch -w server" "npm run test:watch -w webapp"
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w lib && npm run typecheck -w server && npm run typecheck -w webapp
scripts.ci:test: npm run test:coverage -w lib && npm run test:coverage -w server && npm run test:coverage -w webapp
